doc.previous: When a field travels across to different media the properties of the field change according to the various boundary conditions These equations are derived from Maxwell s equations The tangential components of the electric and magnetic fields as they relate on the boundary of two media are as follows 3
doc.after: The angle of refraction of an electric field between media is related to the permittivity of each medium
